name: Fastpress Proxy
author: Prezna Dev Team

sections.description:
A WordPress plugin that proxy traffic from a specific route to another domain with additional sub path
prefix in uri.

Features

  1. Proxy traffic from one path to others to another domain.

Installation and Use

This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  • Upload the plugin files to the directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  • Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  • You need to add a secret key in the plugin settings
  • You can get the key from our administrators

External services

In our plugin, we use an external service https://fastpress.prezna.com.
If you are our client, then you have access to our resource.
We send request data such as user-agent and other http headers values.
All values are secured.

You can also read our privacy policy at the link below:
https://prezna.com/privacy-policy

It’s not working

  • Step 1. Check if your Plugin is activated.
  • Step 2. Deactivate all plugins and reactivate Fastpress Proxy Plugin.
  • Step 3. Check if your secret key is valid.
